title: Working with child care
brief_description: CREDITS: Director, Carolyn Dartnell producer, Rosalind Dey;”SUMMARY: This film tells the story of four families in which the parents must go to work and have a need for child care. Two families were unable to find satisfactory day care which they could afford the other two were more fortunate. The film is based on true examples of working parents”
